discover_best_chefs_desc: Explore a variety of homemade dishes prepared with love by talented chefs near you.
customer_login_desc: Access your account to manage your orders.
chef_login_desc: Access your dashboard to manage your menu and orders.
forgot_password_desc_initial: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.
forgot_password_desc_sent: Check your email for the password reset link.
feature_unavailable_desc_localstorage: This feature is not available when using local storage for authentication.
customer_signup_desc: Join our community and start ordering delicious food.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
chef_signup_desc: Join our platform and start selling your delicious creations.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
validation_email_contains_invalid_chars: Email contains invalid characters. Only letters, numbers, and '._-' are allowed.
validation_email_invalid_format: Please enter a valid email format.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The email, password, or role is incorrect. Please check your credentials.
auth_email_in_use: This email is already in use. Please try another one.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
auth_passwords_do_not_match: The new passwords do not match.
last_5_reviews: Here are the last 5 reviews on your dishes.
no_completed_orders: You have no completed orders yet.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and manage the dishes you offer to customers.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Start by adding your first dish to attract customers.
dish_description_placeholder: A short, appealing description of your dish.
dish_ingredients_placeholder: e.g. Rice, Lentils, Pasta, Tomato Sauce
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
prep_time_positive: Preparation time must be a positive number.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
dish_added_toast_desc: '{{name}}' is now available on your menu.
delete_dish_warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the '{{name}}' dish from your menu.
bio_placeholder: Tell customers a little about yourself and your cooking style.
profile_updated_desc: Your profile information has been saved.
update_error_desc: There was a problem saving your profile.
logout_desc: You will be returned to the homepage.
change_password_desc: Choose a new password for your account.
password_changed_toast_desc: You can now use your new password to log in.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Please check the requirements and try again.
wait_for_chefs: Check back soon as new chefs join our platform!
try_different_search: Try searching for a different name or specialty.
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef hasn't added any dishes to their menu yet.
no_reviews_for_dish: Be the first to review this dish!
login_required_desc: You need to be logged in to place an order.
delivery_information_desc: Confirm your details for the order.
chef_is_busy_desc: The chef is currently busy with other orders. You can still place your order, and it will be added to the queue.
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: This chef is not accepting new orders at the moment. Please check back later.
order_error_desc: You must be logged in and have a delivery address to place an order.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: Your order has been placed in the chef's queue.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} is on its way to the chef for review.
coupon_invalid_error: This coupon code is not valid.
coupon_limit_reached_error: This coupon has reached its usage limit.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not valid for the selected dish.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage discount coupons for your customers.
no_coupons_desc: Create your first coupon to attract more customers.
coupon_code_min_length: Code must be at least 3 characters long.
coupon_code_alphanumeric: Code must be alphanumeric (letters and numbers only).
discount_value_positive: Discount value must be a positive number.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
specific_dishes_desc: Choose the dishes this coupon will apply to.
select_one_dish_for_specific: You must select at least one dish for a specific coupon.
no_dishes_to_add: You don't have any dishes to add to a coupon.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after the start date.
view_past_orders: View your past orders and reorder.
no_ongoing_orders: You have no orders currently in progress.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
no_orders_yet_desc: When you do, they'll appear here.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: The chef has started preparing your order for {{dishName}}.
order_ready_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} is prepared and waiting for pickup.
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} is out for delivery. Enjoy!
order_delivered_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} has been delivered. We hope you enjoy your meal!
order_rejected_notification_desc: Unfortunately, the chef had to cancel your order for {{dishName}}.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: The chef is busy, but your order for {{dishName}} is in the queue!
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: {{customerName}} placed an order, it's been added to your queue.
pending_orders_desc: You have {{count}} order(s) in your queue. Accept them now!
password_db_desc: This page is for demonstration purposes to show the users in local storage.
name: Name
community_chat_desc: Connect with other food lovers and share your experiences!
no_messages_yet: No messages yet. Be the first to start the conversation!
must_be_customer_to_chat: You must be a customer to access the community chat.
no_links_allowed: Sharing links is not allowed in the chat.
status_management_desc: Share a temporary update with your followers.
no_active_status_desc: Share an update to let your followers know what you're cooking!
delete_status_warning: This will permanently delete your current status. This action cannot be undone.
image_is_required: An image is required for the status.
file_too_large_desc: The selected image is too large. Please upload a file smaller than {{size}}.
caption_max_length: Caption cannot be longer than 150 characters.
inappropriate_language_detected_desc: Your message could not be sent. Please respect our community guidelines.
caption_placeholder: Add a caption to your photo...
